CountryCode.title: Country Code
CountryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., US, GB, DE).

PostalCode.title: Postal Code
PostalCode.description: Postal/ZIP code. Format varies by country; validate server-side using the provided Country Code.

LastChangedSince.title: Last Changed Since
LastChangedSince.description: RFC 3339/ISO 8601 timestamp (UTC) to return records last changed on or after this instant.
